TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AccelEditedHandler(object o, AccelEditedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed AccelEditedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the AccelEditedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the AccelEditedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the AccelEditedHandler is removed from the event.
